## noCache() function

adds headers to the response object to add cache control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function noCache(res: http.ServerResponse): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  res | http.ServerResponse | http response |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
